about_the_game:
Nounishpunk immerses players in a comedic action-adventure where they take on the role of a heroic figure in a vibrant, futuristic world. The Nounish World is under threat as rebellious forces unleash their quirky robots, disrupting the harmony of the planets. As the chosen hero, your mission is to stand against these rebels, defeat their robotic enforcers, and restore balance. With fast-paced combat, skateboarding stunts, and a dynamic world to explore, Nounishpunk promises an unforgettable, action-packed adventure.

KEY FEATURES:

  • High-speed skateboarding with thrilling stunts.

  • Hilarious weapons and fast-paced combat.

  • Enjoy the captivating Futuristic Fantasy Art Style.

  • Have a chuckle at the crazy and weird characters.

Gameplay:

Experience high-speed skateboarding combined with thrilling combat. Use an array of hilarious weapons to defeat rogue robots, while performing stunts and tricks to earn Nitro Boosts. Navigate through a dynamic world filled with exciting challenges and epic boss fights. The fast-paced shooter-platformer gameplay keeps every moment intense and fun.

Story & World:

Set in a futuristic world, Nounishpunk’s unique art style brings an imaginative sci-fi universe to life. The story follows Unicorn, our unlikely hero, as he battles to save Lilnouncity from a robot uprising led by the sinister Zombie Hand. Expect quirky humor, fourth-wall-breaking moments, and unexpected twists.

Upgrades & Customization:

Upgrade your character’s weapons, skills, and skateboard while interacting with different factions in the world. Earn rewards based on your choices, and customize your appearance with skins, outfits, and more. The DAO system adds depth, giving you the freedom to shape your character's progression.

Features:

  • Side Missions & Exploration: Unlock collectibles, cosmetics, and hidden secrets.

  • Humor-Fueled Combat: Engage in absurd, fast-paced battles with a variety of ridiculous weapons.

  • Epic Boss Fights: Face off against powerful enemies with unique abilities.

GAMEPLAY LENGTH

10 - 15 hours including 1 hour of playable and non-playable cutscenes.

short_description: Dive into a chaotic city where our hero, Unicorn, battles rogue robots on a motorized skateboard. Packed with action, comedy, and a vibrant futuristic art style, Nounishpunk offers hours of excitement and fun.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
